# SingleStoreConnectionStringBuilder.SslKey property

The path to the client’s SSL private key in PEM format. [`SslCert`](./SslCert.md) must also be specified, and [`CertificateFile`](./CertificateFile.md) should not be.

```csharp
public string SslKey { get; set; }
```
